channel.title: A Script?
channel.description:
I'm looking for a free or paid file hosting script, that displays the files on the home screen or some sort.. Can someone help me?
If anyone is good with PHP and other languages, We Can talk via IM, Skype, Phone.

item.title: A Script?
item.dc:creator: @SRBuckey5266 SRBuckey5266
item.description:
@SRBuckey5266 wrote:

[quote=“xx matty xx, post:24, topic:540837”][quote author=SRBuckey5266 link=topic=659704.msg4411690#msg4411690 date=1393970707]
Dude, are you stupid??

(by the way, Assembly is stilled used in particular areas)
[/quote]
Yeah, I agree with you man. I’ve been writing all my webapps in assembly since 1974. It’s much more efficient and secure, and I can optimise my code much better than any of these newfangled compilers. In fact, one of my guiding principles is KISS. Keep It Simple Stupid… haha! 90s kids think they’re ninja developers using all these high level language constructs when they’re just wasting the efforts and technological breakthroughs of their elders.[/quote]

Who the fuck uses Assembly for web-development?

Read full topic

item.title: A Script?
item.dc:creator: @SRBuckey5266 SRBuckey5266
item.description:
@SRBuckey5266 wrote:

[quote=“Arcik, post:15, topic:540837”][quote author=SRBuckey5266 link=topic=659704.msg4411460#msg4411460 date=1393888968]

Also, PHP is shit.

Shows how much of an idiot you are.

How is he an idiot?

Because each scripting language and programming language has their benefits and disadvantages. Obviously PHP does not have the power of lower level languages such as C++; however, there is really nothing wrong with using it if it’s what suits your needs. I’m tired of all the bandwagon idiots who believe that PHP is a terrible choice and suggest avoiding it. EACH LANGUAGE HAS ITS OWN REASONS FOR BEING USED, AND MANY OF THOSE REASONS MAY SUIT YOUR PERSONAL NEEDS LIKE I SAID.
[/quote]
Make me a website using C++ then.

I’m not sure if you’re aware but things get outdated. So do programming languages. PHP was “okay” at the time but now we have much better alternatives. You probably think assembly is a good language to use also (maybe you fail to see why people avoid using it or try to move away from it quickly).[/quote]

Dude, are you stupid??

(by the way, Assembly is stilled used in particular areas)

Read full topic

PHP CIRCLEJERK CONTINUES[/quote]

item.title: A Script?
item.dc:creator: @Ashi Ashi
item.description:
@Ashi wrote:

[quote=“SRBuckey5266, post:7, topic:540837”][quote author=Arcik link=topic=659704.msg4411451#msg4411451 date=1393886758]

Also, PHP is shit.

Shows how much of an idiot you are.

How is he an idiot?
[/quote]

Because each scripting language and programming language has their benefits and disadvantages. Obviously PHP does not have the power of lower level languages such as C++; however, there is really nothing wrong with using it if it’s what suits your needs. I’m tired of all the bandwagon idiots who believe that PHP is a terrible choice and suggest avoiding it. EACH LANGUAGE HAS ITS OWN REASONS FOR BEING USED, AND MANY OF THOSE REASONS MAY SUIT YOUR PERSONAL NEEDS LIKE I SAID.[/quote]
Make me a website using C++ then.

I’m not sure if you’re aware but things get outdated. So do programming languages. PHP was “okay” at the time but now we have much better alternatives. You probably think assembly is a good language to use also (maybe you fail to see why people avoid using it or try to move away from it quickly).

item.title: A Script?
item.dc:creator: @Starting_up Starting up ...
item.description:
@Starting_up wrote:

I have money to spend on the project i’m trying to create. I want to host Paid/Free iTunes/Mac, Android, windows applications. I want it to pull descriptions, screenshots, the amount of cash it costs, versions, all the information off of the iTunes, Google Play, Windows Store… by simply entering the US store URL when uploading the application, upload via direct link or locally.
Have to register to look at download links off server… a couple of different user accounts, such as, User, Premium User, Mod, Admin?

Let me know if anyone is interested.

EDIT: Since I thought about having all these features for all 3 OS’s I would settle for Just iDevices and if an way Android.

Read full topic
